授業目的: The objective of this course is to give the students an overview of the approaches and methods used in executing business research. The discussion is focused on how to frame the research question, develop hypothesis, select appropriate research methods and assign limited resources (time and staff). We will also examine methods for data collection, interview design and data analysis. The students will use the acquired knowledge to develop a research proposal.
到達目標: By taking this course, students learn an overview of the approaches and methods used in executing business research.
